attributes.action: No Christmas decorations/ songs in shops before 1st of December
attributes.additional_details: I cannot bear another year of listening to tedious repetative christmas songs /carols. With the tinsel, decorations in our shops from July. It surely must be against Health, and Safety to listen endlessly to Slade / Mistletoe and Wine. How  some poor sole has not snapped by now is beyond comprehension. I want it illegal under the mental health act for the above to commence before the 1st Sunday in December
